Description: Verify user can sign in successfully
Steps to Test:
1. Navigate to landing page
2. Click 'Sign In' button
3. Complete authentication flow
Expected Result: User is redirected to dashboard with authenticated state

Steps to Test:
1. Navigate to any app page while logged in
2. Click user profile in sidebar
3. Click 'Sign out' button
Expected Result: User is signed out and redirected to landing page

Description: Verify unauthenticated users cannot access app pages
Steps to Test:
1. Sign out if logged in
2. Try to navigate to /dashboard, /generate, /saved, /history directly
Expected Result: User is redirected to landing page for all protected routes

Description: Verify user session persists across page refreshes
Steps to Test:
1. Sign in
2. Refresh the page
3. Navigate between pages
Expected Result: User remains authenticated without re-login

Steps to Test:
1. Navigate to landing page
2. Check header elements
Expected Result: Header shows logo
Status: and Sign In/Dashboard button based on auth state

Description: Verify hero section layout and spacing
Steps to Test:
1. Navigate to landing page
2. Check hero section
Expected Result: Hero section has proper spacing from header (pt-32/pt-40)

Steps to Test:
1. Navigate to landing page
2. Observe the 'Strength/Endurance/Power/Hypertrophy' marquee
Expected Result: Marquee scrolls smoothly from right to left with seamless looping and no gaps

Steps to Test:
1. Scroll to bottom of landing page
2. Observe the 'FitTracker Pro' marquee
Expected Result: Footer marquee scrolls smoothly in reverse with seamless looping

Steps to Test:
1. Navigate to landing page
2. Scroll to features section
Expected Result: Grid displays 4 feature cards with proper layout (8-4-3-9 column spans on desktop)

Steps to Test:
1. Resize browser window to mobile, tablet, desktop sizes
2. Check all sections
Expected Result: All sections adapt properly to different screen sizes

Description: Verify black background covers entire viewport
Steps to Test:
1. Navigate to landing page
2. Check background color
Expected Result: Black background (#000000) covers entire page without gaps

Description: Verify dashboard loads correctly for authenticated users
Steps to Test:
1. Sign in
2. Navigate to /dashboard
Expected Result: Dashboard displays with stats cards

Steps to Test:
1. Navigate to dashboard
2. Check stats cards
Expected Result: Four stat cards show: Completed workouts

Description: Verify muscle heatmap highlights trained muscles
Steps to Test:
1. Complete a workout or view existing data
2. Navigate to dashboard
3. Check muscle heatmap
Expected Result: Heatmap highlights muscles in orange (#FF4B00) that have been trained

Steps to Test:
1. Navigate to dashboard with workout history
2. Check recent activity section
Expected Result: Shows last 5 workouts with name

Description: Verify empty state when no workouts exist
Steps to Test:
1. Sign in with new account (no workouts)
2. Navigate to dashboard
Expected Result: Shows 'No recent workouts found' message with CTA to generate workout

Description: Verify loading indicator displays during data fetch
Steps to Test:
1. Navigate to dashboard
2. Observe initial load
Expected Result: Loading spinner displays while fetching stats

Description: Verify generate page loads for authenticated users
Steps to Test:
1. Sign in
2. Navigate to /generate
Expected Result: Generate page displays with muscle selector

Steps to Test:
1. Navigate to /generate
2. Click on muscle groups in the SVG diagram
Expected Result: Selected muscles highlight in orange and are added to selection

Steps to Test:
1. Navigate to /generate
2. Toggle equipment options (Bodyweight, Dumbbells, Barbell, Cable)
Expected Result: Selected equipment highlights
Priority: at least one must remain selected

Steps to Test:
1. Navigate to /generate
2. Adjust duration slider
Expected Result: Duration value updates (15-120 minutes range)

Steps to Test:
1. Navigate to /generate
2. Select beginner/intermediate/advanced
Expected Result: Selected difficulty highlights with appropriate color coding

Steps to Test:
1. Select muscles, equipment, duration, difficulty
2. Click 'Generate Workout' button
Expected Result: Loading state shows
Priority: then generated workout displays with exercises

Description: Verify generated workout shows all details
Steps to Test:
1. Generate a workout
2. Review displayed information
Expected Result: Shows workout name

Description: Verify exercise cards show complete information
Steps to Test:
1. Generate a workout
2. Check each exercise card
Expected Result: Each exercise shows: name

Description: Verify exercise cards can be expanded
Steps to Test:
1. Generate a workout
2. Click on an exercise card
Expected Result: Card expands to show full tip and details

Steps to Test:
1. Generate a workout
2. Enter a custom name (optional)
3. Click 'Save Workout'
Expected Result: Success message displays

Steps to Test:
1. Generate a workout
2. Click 'Regenerate' button
Expected Result: New workout is generated with same parameters

Steps to Test:
1. Navigate to /generate
2. Try to generate without selecting muscles
Expected Result: Error message displays: 'Please select at least one muscle group'

Steps to Test:
1. Sign in
2. Navigate to /saved
Expected Result: Page displays list of saved workout templates

Steps to Test: 1. Navigate to /saved with saved workouts
Expected Result: Each workout shows name

Steps to Test:
1. Navigate to /saved
2. Click delete button on a workout
3. Confirm deletion
Expected Result: Workout is removed from list and database

Description: Verify starting a workout logs it
Steps to Test:
1. Navigate to /saved
2. Click 'Start' on a workout
Expected Result: Workout is logged to history with completion timestamp

Steps to Test:
1. Sign in with no saved workouts
2. Navigate to /saved
Expected Result: Shows 'No saved workouts' message with CTA to generate

Steps to Test:
1. Navigate to /saved
2. Check muscle tags on workouts
Expected Result: Shows up to 3 muscle abbreviations

Steps to Test:
1. Sign in
2. Navigate to /history
Expected Result: Page displays list of completed workout logs

Steps to Test: 1. Navigate to /history with completed workouts
Expected Result: Each log shows name

Steps to Test:
1. Navigate to /history
2. Check dates on logs
Expected Result: Shows 'Today', 'Yesterday', 'X days ago', or formatted date

Description: Verify empty state when no history exists
Steps to Test:
1. Sign in with no workout history
2. Navigate to /history
Expected Result: Shows 'No workout history' message with CTA to start training

Description: Verify logs are sorted by date
Steps to Test: 1. Navigate to /history with multiple logs
Expected Result: Most recent workouts appear first

Steps to Test:
1. Sign in
2. Click each navigation link (Dashboard, Generator, Saved, History)
Expected Result: Each link navigates to correct page and highlights active state

Steps to Test:
1. Navigate to different pages
2. Check sidebar
Expected Result: Current page link is highlighted in orange with zinc-900 background

Description: Verify user profile displays in sidebar
Steps to Test:
1. Sign in
2. Check bottom of sidebar
Expected Result: Shows user avatar

Steps to Test:
1. Sign in
2. Check top of sidebar
Expected Result: FitTracker Pro logo and text display

Description: Verify mobile header displays on small screens
Steps to Test:
1. Resize to mobile width (<768px)
2. Check header
Expected Result: Mobile header shows with logo and menu button

Steps to Test:
1. Resize to mobile width
2. Check bottom navigation
3. Click navigation items
Expected Result: Bottom nav shows all pages

Description: Verify mobile floating CTA on dashboard
Steps to Test:
1. Sign in on mobile
2. Navigate to dashboard
Expected Result: Floating 'Generate Workout' button appears at bottom

Description: Verify all pages adapt to mobile
Steps to Test:
1. Navigate through all pages on mobile
2. Check layouts
Expected Result: All content is readable and accessible

Steps to Test:
1. Use mobile device or touch emulation
2. Test all interactive elements
Expected Result: Buttons

Steps to Test:
1. Navigate through all pages
2. Check color usage
Expected Result: Consistent use of #FF4B00 orange

Description: Verify Space Mono font loads correctly
Steps to Test:
1. Navigate to any page
2. Check font rendering
Expected Result: Space Mono font is used throughout the app

Steps to Test: 1. Select text on any page
Expected Result: Selected text shows orange background (#FF4B00) with white text

Description: Verify hover states on interactive elements
Steps to Test:
1. Hover over buttons, links, cards
2. Check visual feedback
Expected Result: All interactive elements show appropriate hover states

Steps to Test:
1. Interact with various UI elements
2. Observe animations
Expected Result: Transitions are smooth and enhance UX (not jarring)

Steps to Test:
1. Sign in
2. Check network tab for /api/stats call
Expected Result: Returns stats object with correct workout counts and muscle data

Steps to Test:
1. Create, read, update, delete workouts
2. Check network responses
Expected Result: All operations succeed with appropriate status codes

Steps to Test:
1. Generate a workout
2. Check network tab
Expected Result: Returns generated workout with exercises or falls back to heuristic

Steps to Test:
1. Complete workouts
2. Check network tab for /api/history calls
Expected Result: Returns workout logs

Steps to Test:
1. Trigger API errors (network issues, invalid data)
2. Check error messages
Expected Result: Appropriate error messages display to user

Steps to Test:
1. Sign out
2. Try to call API endpoints directly
Expected Result: Endpoints return 401 Unauthorized for unauthenticated requests

Steps to Test:
1. Create workouts and logs
2. Sign out and sign back in
3. Check data
Expected Result: All saved workouts and history persist correctly

Description: Verify users only see their own data
Steps to Test:
1. Sign in with User A, create data
2. Sign out, sign in with User B
3. Check data visibility
Expected Result: Each user only sees their own workouts and history

Description: Verify muscle data is stored correctly
Steps to Test:
1. Create workouts with various muscles
2. Check database or dashboard heatmap
Expected Result: Muscle groups are stored as arrays and retrieved correctly

Steps to Test:
1. Navigate to each page
2. Measure load time
Expected Result: Pages load within 2-3 seconds on average connection

Steps to Test:
1. Run 'npm run build'
2. Check for errors
Expected Result: Build completes successfully with no errors

Steps to Test:
1. Check network tab for image loads
2. Verify Next.js Image component usage
Expected Result: Images use Next.js Image component and load efficiently

Steps to Test:
1. Use Tab key to navigate
2. Use Enter/Space to activate elements
Expected Result: All interactive elements are keyboard accessible

Steps to Test:
1. Use screen reader (NVDA, JAWS, VoiceOver)
2. Navigate through pages
Expected Result: Content is properly announced and navigable

Steps to Test:
1. Check text on backgrounds
2. Use contrast checker tool
Expected Result: All text meets WCAG AA standards (4.5:1 for normal text)

Steps to Test:
1. Check all images
2. Verify alt attributes
Expected Result: All images have descriptive alt text

Description: Verify handling of long workout names
Steps to Test:
1. Create workout with very long name (100+ chars)
2. Check display
Expected Result: Long names truncate or wrap appropriately without breaking layout

Steps to Test:
1. Try to deselect all equipment
2. Attempt to generate
Expected Result: At least one equipment option must remain selected

Steps to Test:
1. Try to set duration beyond max (120 min)
2. Check slider behavior
Expected Result: Slider caps at maximum value

Description: Verify multiple users can use app simultaneously
Steps to Test:
1. Sign in with multiple accounts
2. Perform actions simultaneously
Expected Result: Each user's data remains isolated and correct

Description: Verify graceful handling of network errors
Steps to Test:
1. Disable network
2. Try to perform actions
Expected Result: User-friendly error messages display

Steps to Test:
1. Manually corrupt data (if possible)
2. Try to load pages
Expected Result: App handles invalid data gracefully with fallbacks

Steps to Test:
1. Simulate slow API responses
2. Check user feedback
Expected Result: Loading states show

Steps to Test:
1. Try to inject scripts in input fields
2. Check if scripts execute
Expected Result: Scripts are sanitized and do not execute

Steps to Test:
1. Try SQL injection patterns in inputs
2. Check database queries
Expected Result: Parameterized queries prevent SQL injection

Description: Verify Gemini API key is not exposed
Steps to Test:
1. Check client-side code and network requests
2. Verify API key usage
Expected Result: API key is only used server-side

Description: Verify app uses HTTPS in production
Steps to Test:
1. Deploy to production
2. Check URL protocol
Expected Result: App uses HTTPS for all connections
